channel.title: It's-a-Me, Movie! on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in It's-a-Me, Movie! on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Nintendo Drops Surprise Trailer for New Super Mario Galaxy Movie
item.description: The Super Mario Bros. Movie sequel, titled The Super Mario Galaxy Movie, will be released in 2026. The original cast, including Chris Pratt, Anya Taylor-Joy, and Jack Black, will reprise their roles.
